description: This file defines React hooks and utility functions related to user motion preferences, including detecting reduced motion settings and scrolling behavior with smooth or instant scrolls, tailored for components adhering to user accessibility preferences.

methods.name: usePrefersReducedMotion()
methods.description: React hook that detects if the user prefers reduced motion, updating its state accordingly.

methods.name: smoothScrollToId(id, prefersReducedMotion = false)
methods.description: Scrolls smoothly or instantly to the DOM element with the specified id, adjusting for fixed header offset.

methods.name: motionSafe(...tokens)
methods.description: Returns Tailwind CSS class strings that apply only when motion is not reduced, prefixing 'motion-safe:' to each class.
